scripts.test: cross-env ENV=test mocha --require mocha-steps --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill ./test/*.test.js
scripts.testlong: cross-env ENV=test mocha --require mocha-steps --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill -w ./test/*.test.js
scripts.coverage: cross-env ENV=test nyc --reporter=html mocha --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill test/*.test.js
